titles.title: Supporting the World Bank Group to lead a worldwide COVID-19 economic recovery effort.
Supporting the World Bank Group to lead a worldwide COVID-19 economic recovery effort.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the United States (1) should support the World Bank Group to lead a global effort assisting areas that are economically impacted by the effects of COVID-19 (i.e., coronavirus disease 2019), and (2) recognizes the need for global cooperation to overcome shared challenges.
